The colors and stuff seem okay, but it's overall bad. If this was the original design and always had been, it's not.. bad.. but it's worse than what we had
the whole point of a UI is to be minimalistic. Drag user focus to the main reason why they're here, the stream and the chat :/
they've just added two bars that take away from the stream size itself that which do not add to the experience in any way
We already had all the buttons that existed besides the go live button, which isn't even on the new bar they added..
The only thing they've done is moved a bunch of things to two bars above and below the stream to make the stream size smaller.
and that's bad, not good
increasing clutter is never a good thing :/
:rolling_eyes: Makes me wonder if they have a QA department for UI
I guess most companies don't, considering how bad UIs are getting for so many programs
also, the bar below the stream which has nothing of value on it.. is actually in front of the stream window. You can see it cover up the bottom when zooming in/out the page
